trans-unit.source: Represents a serializable collection of service metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Representa una colección serializable de metadatos del servicio en formulario de XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> class contains a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects, each of which contains one dialect of metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> contiene una colección de objetos <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, cada uno de los cuales contiene un dialecto de metadatos en formulario de XML.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> class is used to pass a group of XML metadata documents to and from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> objects, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, la clase <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> se utiliza para pasar un grupo de documentos de metadatos de XML a y desde <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> y los objetos <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter>, como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> y <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para crear <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> a partir de un objeto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> de tipo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, utilice el constructor <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To obtain a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un objeto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> del tipo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A>.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A> method to load a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from XML data and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> method to write the internal metadata to an XML format.
trans-unit.target: Además, puede utilizar el método <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A> para cargar <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> de los datos XML y el método <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> para escribir los metadatos internos en un formato XML.

trans-unit.source: This type implements the structure defined in the WS-MetadataExchange specification.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo implementa la estructura definida en la especificación de WS-MetadataExchange.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuevo objeto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>.

trans-unit.source: The metadata values that the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> is to contain.
trans-unit.target: Los valores de metadatos que <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> va a contener.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> class that contains the specified collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> que contiene la colección especificada de objetos <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from `sections`.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuevo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> a partir de `sections`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> que aparecen en el formulario serializado de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Los objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> que aparecen en el formulario serializado de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> que representan los metadatos.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> que representa los metadatos.

trans-unit.source: The reader to read in XML.
trans-unit.target: El lector para leer en XML.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> desde el objeto especificado <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> that contains all the metadata present in the XML stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> que contiene todos los metadatos presentes en la secuencia XML.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> a partir de un objeto <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El lector es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Implements <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" /> method to provide serialization support.
trans-unit.target: Implementa el método <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" /> para proporcionar la compatibilidad de serialización.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> method and accessed by the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> que describe la representación XML del objeto producido por el método <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> y al que tiene acceso el método <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" />.

trans-unit.source: The reader to use when reading XML.
trans-unit.target: El lector que se utilizará al leer XML.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method to support deserialization from XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementa el método <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> para admitir la deserialización de XML.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El lector es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The writer to use when writing XML.
trans-unit.target: El sistema de escritura que se utilizará al escribir XML.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> method to support serialization to XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementa el método <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> para admitir la serialización a XML.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El escritor es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The writer to use to write the XML.
trans-unit.target: El sistema de escritura utilizado para escribir XML.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> to XML using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe el <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> en XML utilizando el <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> to an XML stream.
trans-unit.target: Escribe un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> en una secuencia XML.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El escritor es <see langword="null" />.
